description: Salary project for entrepreneurs. Allows you to transfer salary, vacation pay, compensation, and other types of payments to employees and the self-employed on any given day. Connect to the Sberbusiness online banking service.
benefits:
Different types of deposits.

You can add money on weekends and holidays.

Payments are made in one register.

The deposit period starts from 1 minute.

Enabling it without visiting the bank.
key_message: Crediting employees ' salaries on any given day.
